testcase.brief: bind 8 ssids to wifi0 and check cca status
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: 1. shutdown wifi1
Test Procedure: 2. create 8 ssids and bind to wifi0 3.show logging buffered 4.check cca log check if adaptive cca adjustment is correct.there is a formula: Interference (percentage) CCA Threshold Comment 5% Default CCA Set CCA as default value 5% - 10 % Default CCA + 3dB Increase threshold by 3dB 10% - 15% Default CCA + 6dB Increase threshold by 6dB 15% - 20% Default CCA + 9dB Increase threshold by 9dB 20% - 25% Default CCA + 12dB Increase threshold by 12dB Above 25% Max CCA Set CCA to the max value Default CCA:33.Max CCA:55. For example: (according to the value of interference to adjusted the value of CCA) the 2012-03-07 22:14:16 info [wifi] : wifi0: CCA reduce to 54 2012-03-22:13:14 info [wifi] : wifi0: adj CCA from 54 to 55 interference 92 interference is 92, also is Above 25% ,the CCA is adjusted to Max CCA: 55 5.show logging buffered, check beacon stuck
